content: >armo is my christmas / holiday season gift for the knitters in 2023 it can also be downloaded on payhip 1 with pay what you want option **pattern features ** - knitted cuff down - instructions written in metric and us terminology - instructions written for magic loop but dpns can be used as well - three sizes small 64 sts medium/large 72 sts and extra-large 80 sts - slipped-stitch heel flap and round heel turn - charts but no written instructions for stranded colourwork - pattern proof-read by helena kahan and mari kuparinen - approximate yardage 55-65 grams of mc dark grey 10-15 grams of cc1 variegated orange and 10-15 grams of cc2 white 1 https //payhip com/b/wccim
